course_title: Special Topics in NBB: Dopaminergic Brain
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 1
class_notes:
NBB 370 ¿ The Dopaminergic Brain    Prerequisites: NBB 301
Description: Many people have a vague understanding of dopamine and would say it is the happy hormone that gets you hooked on drugs. Is this the whole truth? In this course we will discuss what drives dopamine release and how it causes different behavioral outcomes through molecular mechanisms in an attempt to understand treatment of mental disorders such as schizophrenia, and dopamine¿s role in addiction, social interactions and gut health.
course_description: Study of variable topics of special interest in neuroscience and behavioral biology. May be repeated for credit when topics vary.
